import React, { useState } from 'react' import {FaCheck} from 'react-icons/fa' import {ImCross} from 'react-icons/im' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import styles from './PasswordModal.module.css' const PasswordModal = ({setChangePassword}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [requirement, setRequirement] = useState({ length: false, hasNumber: false }) const closeModal = () => { dispatch({type: 'MODAL', payload: false}); setChangePassword(false); } return (
Change Password
Passwords must contain:
{requirement.length ? : }
At least 6 characters
{requirement.hasNumber ? : }
At least 1 number (0-9)
) } export default PasswordModal
